text: Steve Scalise is the GOP's next pick for speaker  —  The Louisiana Republican defeated Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan in a secret-ballot vote on Wednesday.

‘We have 8 people who are insane’: Republican inside speaker vote bashes colleagues  —  WASHINGTON — Republicans are behind closed doors Wednesday trying to figure out how to get to electing a new Speaker of the House so they can navigate the impending demands of the war in Israel and a possible government shutdown.

Marjorie Taylor Greene won't support her party's choice for House speaker because he has cancer  — House Republicans just narrowly nominated Rep. Steve Scalise to be their candidate for speaker.  — But Marjorie Taylor Greene is withholding her support, citing his cancer diagnosis.
